Description: Clay tablet; round type; nearly complete; memorandum concerning three Elamites (?) assigned to guard the Tigris together with Suteans; Old Babylonian.
Bibliographic references: Leichty E et al 1988a / Catalogue of the Babylonian Tablets in the British Museum, volume VIII: Tablets from Sippar 3 (p.268)
Acquisition name: From: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
